languages.text: "Пайки вдвое урезали, еще и выдают еле-еле!"
"First they cut the rations in half, and now they're dragging their feet handing them out!"
languages.original_text: "Пайки вдвое урезали, еще и выдают еле-еле!"

traits.locale_text: "First they cut the rations in half, and now they're dragging their feet handing them out!"
"First they cut the rations in half, and now they're dragging their feet handing them out!"
"First they cut the rations in half, and now they're dragging their feet handing them out!"
"First they cut the rations in half, and now they're dragging their feet handing them out!"
"First they cut the rations in half, and now they're dragging their feet handing them out!"

languages.text: “他们先是把口粮砍了一半，现在又拖着不给我们发！”
languages.original_text: "First they cut the rations in half, and now they're dragging their feet handing them out!"

traits.locale_text: “他们先是把口粮砍了一半，现在又拖着不给我们发！”

languages.text: «¡Primero nos reducen las raciones a la mitad, y ahora las reparten como si les pesaran las manos!».
languages.original_text: "First they cut the rations in half, and now they're dragging their feet handing them out!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Primero nos reducen las raciones a la mitad, y ahora las reparten como si les pesaran las manos!».

languages.text: 「最初は配給が半分に減らされて、今やノ配給を渋っている始末だ」
languages.original_text: "First they cut the rations in half, and now they're dragging their feet handing them out!"

traits.locale_text: 「最初は配給が半分に減らされて、今やノ配給を渋っている始末だ」

languages.text: "Erst halbieren sie die Rationen, und jetzt trödeln sie bei der Ausgabe!"
languages.original_text: "First they cut the rations in half, and now they're dragging their feet handing them out!"

traits.locale_text: "Erst halbieren sie die Rationen, und jetzt trödeln sie bei der Ausgabe!"

languages.text: « D'abord, ils divisent les rations par deux, et maintenant ils traînent pour les distribuer ! »
languages.original_text: "First they cut the rations in half, and now they're dragging their feet handing them out!"

traits.locale_text: « D'abord, ils divisent les rations par deux, et maintenant ils traînent pour les distribuer ! »

languages.text: "Önce kumanyaları yarıya düşürdüler, şimdi de dağıtırken ayak sürüyorlar!"
languages.original_text: "First they cut the rations in half, and now they're dragging their feet handing them out!"

traits.locale_text: "Önce kumanyaları yarıya düşürüyorlar, şimdi de dağıtırken ayak sürüyorlar!"
